docname: CASE OF SANOMA UITGEVERS B.V. v. THE NETHERLANDS
externalsources: Resolution on Journalistic Freedoms and Human Rights, adopted at the 4th European Ministerial Conference on Mass Media Policy (Prague, 7-8 December 1994);Resolution on the Confidentiality of Journalists’ Sources by the European Parliament (18 January 1994, Official Journal of the European Communities No. C 44/34);Recommendation No. R(2000)7 on the right of journalists not to disclose their sources of information adopted by the Committee of Ministers of the Council of Europe on 8 March 2000
issue: Articles 67, 96a, 184, 217-219 and 552a of the Code of Criminal Procedure ; Guidelines on the position of the press in relation to police action issued by the Minister of Justice on 19 May 1988
